newsletter_signup_checkbox: <input type="checkbox" id="inlineCheckbox1" name="additionalCheckbox[]" data-error-message="Please confirm newsletter subscription!">
order_confirm_text: By clicking "Order Now" I am ordering the [[funnel_name]] trial for [[currency]]5.95. I agree to the Terms and Conditions ; I will be enrolled in the monthly auto-ship program in which I will receive a new bottle of [[funnel_name]] every 30 days, and be billed the total monthly subscription charge of [[currency]]99.01 ([[currency]]93.06 + [[currency]]5.95 shipping and handling) upon shipment, until I cancel. I can cancel or request a refund by calling Customer Support Monday-Friday 8am-8pm PST at [[funnel_support_phone]], or by sending an email to [[funnel_support_email]] . My [[funnel_name]] will be shipped via USPS within 2-3 business days of my order. All charges will appear as [[funnel_name]] on my credit card billing statement.
fda_disclaimer_text_1: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. If you are pregnant, nursing, or taking medication we suggest consulting with a physician before using any of our products.
fda_disclaimer_text_2: FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA and are not intended to diagnose, cure or prevent disease. Please consult your physician before beginning any diet or exercise program. If there is a change in your medical condition, please notify your physician immediately and stop taking the product. The product is not intended for use by any individual under 18 years of age, pregnant or lactating women. People with the following conditions should contact a doctor before consuming this product: high blood pressure, heart, liver, kidney or thyroid disease, diabetes, anemia, depression, anxiety, other psychiatric conditions, a family history of these or other medical conditions, or if taking any prescription, OTC and/or other herbal medications.
product_trial_disclaimer_text: By placing your order today you'll be shipped a 30 day supply of [[funnel_name]] for only [[currency]][[crm_product_price]]. This gives you the opportunity to try this remarkable product so you can come to a decision for yourself if this is the right product for you. If you are dissatisfied with the product, you must call [[funnel_support_phone]] within 10 days trial plus 4 days shipping (total of 14 days) from today to cancel your membership and avoid being charged of [[currency]]99.01 ([[currency]]93.06 + [[currency]]5.95 shipping and handling), which is the full price of the product. If you are satisfied with the product, you need do nothing else and upon the expiration of the trial period, you will be billed [[currency]]99.01. The total monthly subscription charge of [[currency]]99.01 USD includes shipping and handling for the full cost of the product. Thirty days after your trial period ends and every thirty days thereafter, we will send you a fresh monthly supply at the low price of [[currency]]99.01 ([[currency]]93.06 + [[currency]]5.95 shipping and handling) per until you cancel your membership. There's no obligation and you may cancel your membership at any time by calling  [[funnel_support_phone]] or by sending an email to [[funnel_support_email]]. The trial period begins from the day of ordering the product.
product_purchase_greetings_text: We take great pride in the quality of our products and are confident that [[funnel_name]] is the most effective and powerful product in the market today. Today, you will be charged [[currency]]4.95 s&h for 12-day trial of Inner Well Beauty. On the 12th day, you will be charged [[currency]]89.99 for the bottle you received. 30 days after today and monthly thereafter, you will receive Inner Well Beauty for [[currency]]89.99, recurring monthly until cancelled. Membership in the maintenance program may be cancelled at any time by calling customer service at[[funnel_support_phone]].
thank_you_page_message:
Thank you for your order!

Your order has been successfully received and is now being processed.
Please allow 5-7 days for shipping.

We will automatically email your tracking number when your order ships.
